attributes.action: Take action to stop illegal immigration and rapidly remove illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details:
Illegal immigrants are entering the UK illegally in many different ways, including small boats from France which are not stopped by either French or British forces.

The Government should take action to reduce/stop illegal immigration into the UK and enable the rapid removal of immigrants found to be here illegally.

Illegal immigration also constitutes a much greater threat of the spread of other Covid-19 strains.
attributes.background: The Government should take action to reduce/stop illegal immigration into the UK and enable the rapid removal of immigrants found to be here illegally.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition currently open on this topic:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
